price: 71. Évoque ton Seigneur lorsqu’Il dit aux Anges : « Je vais créer un homme à partir de l’argile.
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّي خَٰلِقُۢ بَشَرٗا مِّن طِينٖ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla rabbuka lil'malāikati innī khāliqun basharan min ṭīnin
